name: Occupation 2.5
summary:
First/Third Person Shooter.
Save the world from extraterrestrial invasion.

name: Octoportals
summary: A 2D pixel art arcade roguelike. Kill enemies, collect keys, unlock portals, and race to escape. Transform your octopus into powerful forms. Pick wrong? Fight a boss. Run out of time? No choice left. Every portal is a risk. Every second counts.

name: Occult Hand of the Blood Lily
summary: A Gothic-Punk yuri visual novel about a magician on the run and her mysterious vampiric guardian. Journey by airship across a war-torn Europe and search for a legendary flower with the power to destroy nations.

name: Octodad Shorts
summary:
It’s finally time… time for two brand spakin’ new levels of Octodad: Dadliest Catch; the Shorts! After the great response Octodad received from y’all, we wanted to give back a little in thanks for your support. Everyone who currently owns Octodad: Dadliest Catch as well as anyone who grabs a copy in the future will get these levels FREE through the new v1.2.x patch.
In addition to the new levels, there will be an assortment of bug fixes and smaller features, such as multiple mouse support for co-op, persistent checkpoint on last played freeplay/shorts level, and a global story timer.

name: Occupied
summary: a funi little game made in two weeks during the GDKO Gamejam

name: Ocean Otter Climb
summary: Ocean Otter Climb is a 2D platformer game about climbing to great heights. Let's climb With CUTE SEA OTTER!

name: Occultism
summary:
A ritual magic system centered around summonable spirits allows you to automate various tasks, store vast amounts of items, let demons mine in void dimensions, create powerful enchanted tools and jewelry, get support from familiars, and much much more.

Begin your journey by crafting the Dictionary of Spirits, and following that in-game guide, discover the secrets of the spirit world,
find otherworld groves hidden in plain sight by gaining the "Third Eye", and finally summon your first spirit.

name: OctaFight
summary: OctaFight is an explosive combat game. A tribute to good old couch multiplayer titles, offering intense and devastating versus matches. Create your own fighting rules, from fairly competitive to deliciously chaotic, compose with various bomb types, crazy game modes and momentous arenas. With his amazing overpixelated Art, OctaFight declare his love to minimalism and refined design, and explore the promises of the ultra-low definition! Features : - Simple controls and deep gameplay - From 2 to 8 players in a same couch - Create your own fighting rules - Overpixelated Art

name: Oceanides of the World's End: Legend of the Big-breasted Swimsuit Beauty Guardian
summary: "Fast-paced, rogue-like defense action game with simple controls! The Ark of Beauties in Swimsuits, 'GFM Oceanus,' is inhabited solely by stunning women. Neptes must battle the Deep Ones threatening them and unravel the mystery of the 'Great Mother of the Abyss.'"

name: Octahedron
summary: Surf through a pulsating, underground world on platforms pulled from thin air in this challenging psychedelic action platformer that has you defying gravity to a pumping beat.

name: Ocero 3D
summary: A free, Sega Saturn-inspired 3D fighting game. Soar through the sky and master your powerful techniques!

name: Oceanic Rails
summary: Oceanic Rails is a game about building your island and creating combinations of crops, helpers, animals, modifiers, upgrades and more to pay your rent at the end of the week. Try out challenges and overcome the tricky weather or build you island worry free and create a beautiful pixel art world.

name: Octopath Traveler: Champions of the Continent
summary: A prequel to Octopath Traveler to be released in 2019 on iOS and Android.

name: Octocopter: Double or Squids
summary: Oh no! Part way through their epic battle the Octopus and Submarine have lost their way and sunk to the bottom of the ocean. Can you help them to work together to escape these deadly depths? To complete each level you must navigate the maze without crashing. You won't stop spinning so timing is everything! Brave the depths alone or race together in up to 4 player split screen action. Can you beat your friends and collect all the squid medals?

name: Octopath Traveler II
summary:
This game is a brand-new entry in the Octopath Traveler series. It takes the series’ HD-2D graphics, a fusion of retro pixel art and 3DCG, to even greater heights.
In the world of Solistia, eight new travelers venture forth into an exciting new era.
Where will you go? What will you do? Whose tale will you bring to life?
Every path is yours to take. Embark on an adventure all your own.

name: Ocarina of Time + Majora's Mask Crossover Randomizer
summary: Combined version of Ocarina of Time and Majora's Mask randomizer.

name: Ocean Survivors
summary: Rule the high seas in intense naval combat! Dodge cannonballs, sink enemy ships, and loot their wrecks to upgrade your vessel. Steer the ultimate pirate ship and dominate the ocean!

name: Octopus Bar
summary: Enter this hidden izakaya bar hidden deep in the magical forest, where the octopus serves you, fish float into the sky, and a frog enjoys the your company while smoking his pipe. In this world the impossible is now possible and you are invited to discover the games and enjoy this whimsical scenery.

name: Ocean Raft Simulator & Survival
summary: Discover islands, craft tools, and battle the deep.

name: Occult Office: Lofi Rituals
summary: Welcome to Occult Office, a cozy and mysterious productivity game! Decorate your workspace, conquer to-do lists, and explore dungeons on your coffee breaks. Master daily rituals, collect strange pets, and climb the corporate ladder - all in cozy pixel art with a Lovecraftian twist.

name: Octane Remix
summary:
Octane Remix is a Singleplayer Obstacle Hell Racing Game focused on Customization and Replayability.
Octane Remix offers the racing fan everything they could want! Everything from unique characters, each with their own playstyle, to a distinct artstyle.
Remix your levels and compete against the clock, or with other players in a race to decide out who is the better driver!

In its recently released alpha state, Octane Remix only features a single player mode, with multiplayer expected to be released by the time the beta rolls out!

name: Oceanlust: Erotic Descent
summary: Who can say no when the opportunity of a lifetime drops into their lap? A submarine tour of the world’s most famous shipwreck alongside the sexiest girl you’ve ever met. Sure, there were a lot of waivers to sign but it’ll be fine. They know what they’re doing… Right...?

name: Octrons Challenge: Mission Science Genius
summary: Octrons Challenge - Mission Science World is an arcade style Flying SuperHero Sci-Fi action adventure game for children and family.

name: Octofight Escape
summary:
Directly inspired from escape and guessing games, Octofight Escape allows you to show your strategic skills to get out of the place in which you have chosen to appear as quickly as possible.
Each game is unique: the exits, the roles, and the items change.
It's up to you and your teammates to adapt in order to escape as discreetly as possible. Communication will be your best friend, remember you play as a team.

Two teams are facing each other, the « defenders » and the « attackers ».
The defenders must complete missions all game long, if they manage to accomplish them, they’ll win.
The attackers must attempt to escape by finding solutions, while doing tasks that the defenders will require them to do.

The lobby system allows you to create private or public games, in order to play, as you wish, only with your friends or other players from the Octofight community.
Thanks to the in-game mic system, you can as well coordinate and chat verbally with your friends and as well as with other players.
Updates are common for the delight of players, in order to add content such as characters, cosmetics, maps, and other ways of playing...

Time is running out, don’t waste it, run aways or catch them all!

name: Octonauts and the Giant Squid
summary: A sea monster has attacked the Octonauts, and it turned out to be Irving, the giant squid cousin of Professor Inkling. Now the Octonauts will have to look for him to discover what happened and help him.

name: Octogeddon
summary: Octogeddon is a semi-casual action strategy game. You play as Octogeddon, a giant mutant octopus bent on world destruction. Grow more tentacles and evolve each of them into deadlier weapons until you become the ultimate eight-legged killing machine!

name: Octopus Goulash
summary: Explore a futuristic metropolis, interact with a population of NPCs, and experience a unique narrative. Engage in dynamic missions, battle between flying cars, and shape your story in this interactive world where every choice is an opportunity, every moment an unparalleled adventure!

name: Ocean's Heart
summary:
Ocean’s Heart is an action RPG featuring detailed pixel art with a heavy focus on exploration. In a lively world teeming with secrets and mysteries, Tilia sets out in search of her missing father. Follow the trail through the ruins of a flooded kingdom, shape the future of the current world, or keep your head down and focus on your own mission in this epic retro-inspired adventure!

Explore a detailed and beautiful world, brimming with secrets hidden in misty forests, isolated mountain peaks, or saltwater marshes. Every area is filled with unique and meaningful sidequests, ancient mysteries, and dangers.

Battle fearsome monsters and wield various weapons and ancient magic to defeat or outmaneuver them. Search for special materials to upgrade your weapons until you're demolishing monsters who once put up a fierce fight.

Gather various items throughout the world to craft potions, upgrade weapons, and expand your ever-growing arsenal.

name: Occupy Mars: The Game
summary: Build and upgrade your base, discover new amazing regions, conduct mining operations, retrieve water and generate oxygen, grow crops, fix broken parts, learn how to survive on Mars! Occupy Mars is a highly technical, open world, sandbox, hard SF game about Mars colonisation. Inspired by the most promising technologies and companies who work towards the goal of becoming a multi planet species.

name: Ocean City Racing: Redux
summary: Popular open-world driving game features an explorable Free Roam Environment, a thrilling Race Mode and a highly addictive Time-Trial Mode.

name: Ocarina of Time Redux
summary: This hack aims at improving the original experience of Ocarina of Time by adding some QoL improvements by applying the ASM patches provided by the Ocarina of Time Randomizer project by Roman971 and its contributors.

name: Octane100
summary: Join the fight against a corrupt oil corporation flooding the world with low-quality fuel in a turn-based roguelite adventure. Switch between intense battles and peaceful exploration to bring a better future to the world.

name: Octopus 21
summary: Octopus 21 is a Homebrew version of the classic Game & Watch game "Octopus" for the Amstrad GX4000 and Amstrad CPC.

name: Octohill Ski Tycoon
summary: Octohill is a casual game about building and managing your own ski resort. Mark ski trails, connect them with lifts and watch your snowmobiles rushing to rescue those daring skiers who went a little too far.

name: Octopus
summary: Mario is a sea diver and must deliver treasure to Princess Peach, but he must avoid the Octopus's arms. His speed is affected by how much treasure he is carrying, but he can throw his bagful of treasure at the Octopus's arms. Bonus points are awarded depending on how much treasure he gives to Peach

name: Octopus
summary:
The gameplay in this version is largely the same, but the graphics are updated, and the divers are replaced by Mario down below and Princess Peach in the boat. In this version, Mario earns twice as many points for every piece of treasure he brings to Peach. However, Mario gets slower as he grabs more treasure. To counter this, he can throw all of his treasure, which lightens his load and can stun one of the Octopus's arms for a brief time. Sometimes the Octopus squirts clouds of black ink, and if one hits Mario, he receives a miss. When Mario amasses 200, 500, and 700 points, a Lakitu appears and drops a heart for him to remove a miss. The Modern version also features music, with the tempo changing depending on the speed of the game. In Game & Watch Gallery 4, the Octopus changes color each time the player gets 200 points.

In Game & Watch Gallery 4, if the player selects the game yet does not actually start it, a humorous sequence is shown. Mario arrives with a bag of loot in one hand and a Game Boy Advance in another. However, he ends up surrounded by four octopus arms (two on each side) that are menacing him. Trapped, he then calls on a Lakitu to help him. He then grabs the fishing pole of the Lakitu and, trying to hold on, is ultimately forced to drop his belongings, with a crown and gold objects falling out of the loot bag. Finally, each octopus arm retrieves a treasure, including the loot bag itself as well as the GBA.

name: Ocean Driving: Boat Parking Simulator
summary: Realistic watercraft boat parking simulator - test your ship mooring skills in dangerous conditions!

name: Ocean of Vengeance
summary: Ocean of Vengeance is a 2D pirate adventure where you sail across oceans, explore unique islands, and battle enemy ships in turn-based combat. Discover mini-games, recruit crew, earn loot, and upgrade your ship as you uncover the secrets of the high seas.

name: Ocean Wonder VR
summary: Ocean Wonder VR is a Simulation VR Game. Collect different fish species and save the ocean from contamination. Make friends with mermaids and mysterious creatures in your undersea journey!

name: Oceanview Mall
summary: Oceanview Mall is an atmospheric, hub-and-spoke horror game set in a seemingly abandoned mall. However, it may not be as abandoned as you think. Play as Wilson Wyatt, a rich real estate agent whose focus on money has created a rift within his family. Experience Wilson's terror as he faces a torment of his own making. Escape the mall and repair Wilson's broken relationships.

name: Octrons Challenge Reloaded
summary: Flying SuperHero! Giant Alien Monsters! Laser Weapons!

name: Ocean Fishooter
summary: Try the best fish-shooting game and experience the most thrilling shooting action and the most immersive adventure! Start your hunting journey now — challenge sea creatures, zombie hordes, fantasy monsters, and ancient dinosaurs to hone your shooting skills!

name: Ocean Drift
summary:
Humans have surpassed their limits and have evolved to this point mainly because their skills have been tested and improved. While numerous games try to do something similar, none seems to do it as well as Ocean Drift, a new and exciting arcade game with a simple premise that will keep you coming back for more.
Drag your thumb on the screen and watch the boat drift through the sea!

name: Octopus
summary: Octopus is a Game & Watch game that was released on the G&W widescreen series. In the game, you, the diver, must get around an octopus whom is trying to capture you and get to the treasure. When Mr. Game & Watch returns to the salvage ship, he gets three extra points. The player's three chances are measured by extra divers on the savage ship. When one is attacked by the Octopus' tentacles, another takes his place.

name: OctoFurry
summary: A tetris attack puzzle style game in which you play as furry sorcerers trying to save their kingdom from the tentacles of an evil ancient race.

name: Ochitsubaki
summary: OCHITSUBAKI is a bilingual JPN/ENG transgender fantasy visual novel with an experimental poetic storytelling structure, a retro anime aesthetic, and a lush original orchestral soundtrack

name: Occult Secrets of the Third Reich on Mars
summary: Occult Secrets of the Third Reich on Mars is the 21st limit-removing project from the inglorious bastards themselves: the Doomer Boards Krew. Featuring nine maps of outrageous soon-to-be-banned-in-Germany action, not to mention possibly the most sector swastikas ever assembled in a single WAD file, OSotTRoM is a timely reminder that the only good Nazi demon is a dead Nazi demon. On Mars.

name: Occupy Mars: Prologue
summary: Occupy Mars: Prologue is an introduction to the world of Occupy Mars in which you have to use your brain in order to survive. The Prologue tells a separate story in a closed location and shows a sneak-peek of the full game mechanics.

name: Oct 14
summary: It's what happened that day.

name: Ocean Journey
summary: This is a relaxing and therapeutic game where players control a ship, accompanied by a little sprite, to explore this boundless sea. Of course, there will be many dangers and unexpected encounters along the way. Choose the best strategy while avoiding danger to reach even greater destinations!

name: Oceanarium
summary: Oceanarium is an underwater adventure game about the great conjunction of Jupiter and Saturn.

name: Oceanhorn 2: Knights of the Lost Realm
summary: Oceanhorn 2: Knights of the Lost Realm, set a thousand years before the events of the first chapter, takes the player on a magical journey across the vast world of Gaia, brimming with mythology and lore. A young Knight faces an impossible challenge, as Warlock Mesmeroth has returned with a formidable Dark Army. Will the hero be able to unite the Owrus, Gillfolk, and men in a fight for the fate of the world?

name: Occupy White Walls
summary: To say it’s a PC sandbox-building, AI-driven MMO where people play with Art, developed by folks who really love architecture and abstract characters… would be a bit of a mouthful.

name: Ocean Playground
summary: This is a collection of multiple casual mini-games. A variety of mini-games allow players to experience different fun. All casual mini games are completely free to play.

name: Ocean Keeper Co-op
summary: Dive into the Ocean Keeper — a cooperative roguelike where four survival miners defend their Mech Spider, fight with endless hordes of monsters, and dig for resources. Team up with your friends, upgrade between waves, and survive the deep caves, full of treasures… if you can.

name: OctoCraps
summary: OctoCraps — the craps you never asked for! Roll eight-sided dice, place your bets, and try your luck in this fast, unpredictable twist on a casino classic.

name: Ochin ni Toshi Puzzle Tonjan!?
summary:
A block moving puzzle game similar to Sokoban.

Okkotoshi Puzzle Tonjan!? ("Drop Down Puzzle Tonjan?!", sometimes known as simply Tonjan) is a puzzle game from NMK that features anthropomorphic pigs pushing mahjong tiles around in a maze, attempting to push entire stacks down one of the many holes in the area. Bonus points are awarded for pushing certain specified tiles into holes first, and there's one tile in particular that will complete the level once pushed down a hole and is the only compulsory target. Future levels increase the number of tiles and the difficulty, adding fish tiles that cause the player to lose a life if they are pushed down a hole.

Okkotoshi Puzzle Tonjan!? appears to a sequel to NMK's earlier Arcade multiplayer action game Butasan, which features similar looking pigs. The rights to the Arcade version of Tonjan were sold to a Korean company, Dooyong, which turned it into a game named Yam! Yam?! featuring a tanooki wearing an apron.

name: Oceanhorn
summary:
You wake up and find a letter from your father. He is gone…
The only lead is his old notebook and a mysterious necklace. What happened?

Explore the islands of Uncharted Seas, a world filled with many dangers, puzzles and secrets. Fight monsters, learn to use magic and discover ancient treasures which will help you on your quest. Use all your wits and skill to unravel the mysteries of ancient kingdom Arcadia and sea monster Oceanhorn.

Oceanhorn combines captivating storytelling, breathtaking 3D visuals and exciting gameplay into one massive action adventure experience you will never forget.

Enjoy an incredible soundtrack from the best video game composers in the world:
Nobuo Uematsu (Final Fantasy*) and Kenji Ito (Seiken Densetsu*)

Master the game effortlessly with accurate touch controls or controller.

Please Note: Oceanhorn is a free to download premium game with a single in-app purchase to unlock the full version.
You can play the first chapter for free and test it on your device first.

name: Octopath Traveler
summary: A role-playing game from the Bravely Default team is being developed exclusively for the Nintendo Switch. They have brought a new world to life through a mix of CG, pixel art, and "HD-2D" visuals.

name: Ocean Animals Puzzle for Kids & Toddlers
summary: The perfect game for little kids and babies! No language skills required! Preschool & learning with fun!

name: Oceanhorn: Chronos Dungeon
summary: Chronos Dungeon is a dungeon crawler geared towards local multiplayer. Inspired by 16-bit classics, but enhanced with randomized modifiers making each level unique, Chronos Dungeon has players collecting loot and fighting side by side in an epic quest against the god that set the events of the main Oceanhorn saga in motion, Chronos himself.

name: Ocean's Venus
summary: A point and click horror game aboard a ship with inscrutable history. Your job as a maintenance worker aboard is to make sure everything runs as it should, or so you've been told...

name: Octopath Traveler: Traveler's Compendium Edition
summary:
A role-playing game from the Bravely Default team is being developed exclusively for the Nintendo Switch. They have brought a new world to life through a mix of CG, pixel art, and "HD-2D" visuals.

The Traveler's Compendium Edition contains:
Octopath Traveler Game
Double-Sided cloth World Map of Osterra
Replica of a Leaf Coin, the in-game currency
8-Page Pop-up Book with Item Compartments

name: Ocean Ranger
summary: A naval simulation game. The Ocean Ranger is the first of a new class of frigate sized foilborne missile ships. You are able to track and destroy targets on the sea surface, beneath the sea, and in the air. Missions occur in one of four locations (from easiest to most difficult), the Bering Sea, Southeast Asia, Central America, and the Persian Gulf. While in port you can choose to equip your ship with a variety of weapons, then take off to rid an area of hostile enemies. In battle the view is from the deck of the boat, allowing enemies to be targeted and destroyed.

name: Ocolast: Origens de Paulo Guina
summary: Ocolast - Origens de Paulo Guina is a fan-made prequel to the parody horror game, Ocolast. as you control Jailson Mendes, a reporter trapped in a prison with a deranged inmate called Paulo Guina.

name: Octodad: Dadliest Catch
summary: Octodad: Dadliest Catch is a game about destruction, deception, and fatherhood. The player controls Octodad, a dapper octopus masquerading as a human, as he goes about his life. Octodad's existence is a constant struggle, as he must master mundane tasks with his unwieldy boneless tentacles while simultaneously keeping his cephalopodan nature a secret from his human family.

name: Occulto
summary: Occulto is an indie adventure game with a focus on artistic hand-drawn visuals and a non verbal game play, set in a fantasy world. Guide Eliot through riddles, mysteries, puzzles, strange creatures, faraway places and help him find his master!

name: Ocean City Killer
summary: Ocean City Killer is an open-world corporate dungeon crawler. You play as Rick Atlanta, a private eye investigating the death of a former colleague. What starts out as a routine case pulls you into the dark labyrinth of a seedy megacorp. Hop in your muscle car to explore the city!

name: Oceanwork
summary: Dive deeper and deeper into the depths of the ocean to gather more and more rare resources. But watch out for what is lurking the depths. The shop, with all it’s upgrades will turn out to be very valuable. Dive, Mine, Sell & Thrive!

name: Octopath Traveler 0
summary:
All the definitive elements of the Octopath Traveler series return in this exciting prequel set in the realm of Orsterra. Embark on a brand new adventure of your own creation in this stunning HD-2D RPG, Octopath Traveler 0!

Brand-new features to the series include a character creation system where you get to become the hero, and town building mechanics as you seek to restore your devastated home.

name: Occlude
summary: Occlude is a ritual disguised as Solitaire; a cosmic-horror card game where the rules are obscured and reality is at stake. Play through cryptic challenges to reveal forbidden lore in this singleplayer narrative puzzle game for the terminally curious. Don’t worry; you can always start over.

name: Octavio Camacho
summary:
Based on the online graphic novel. This story takes place in a world filled with science gone mad, old society class revived, and a secret contest to possess
the chalice of Exon. To set the world right Octavio Camacho and his covert task- force named W.A.R.C.O.M are ready to take on the mission.

name: Ocean Nomad: Survival on Raft
summary: You are floating in the middle of the ocean on a few wooden planks. Catch resources from the water to expand the raft. Craft gear and weapons to fight off a ferocious shark. Sail to islands and see what lies in wilds! A perilous adventure awaits!

name: Ocean Planet
summary: Ocean Planet takes the ideas & gameplay of "Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy" and treats it as an art form, with atmospheric & immersive visuals and audio. You will be plunged into a diverse aquatic world, and it is up to you to rise up and see what awaits you at the surface.

name: Octogram
summary: The last game published by Jack Lance.

name: Ochaken no Daibouken: Honwaku Yumemiru Sekai Ryoukou
Ocean Is Home
summary: Ocean is Home is an island life simulator and an open world adventure rolled into one. Starting with a small house and an old pickup truck, you can build an estate and become a significant person in a warm tropical paradise.

name: Ocean Pressure
summary: Ocean Pressure is a singleplayer game where you as an old scientist piloting your handmade submarine in the bottom of the ocean. Your mission is explore the ocean and collect required data with help of your submarine.

name: Octahedron: Transfixed Edition
summary:
Surf through a pulsating underworld on platforms YOU pull from thin air, where and when you want, in this psychedelic action platformer. Unlock devastating abilities across 50+ handcrafted levels as you defy gravity to a pumping beat.

Enjoy brand new features & content exclusive to the Transfixed Edition: New time trial medals, dozens of new special challenges and new post-game unlockables.

name: Oceanhorn: Monster of Uncharted Seas
summary:
You wake up and find a letter from your father. He is gone… The only lead is his old notebook and a mysterious necklace. What happened?

Oceanhorn: Monster of Uncharted Seas combines captivating storytelling, breathtaking 3D visuals and exciting gameplay into one epic action-adventure experience. In the game you explore the islands of Uncharted Seas, a world filled with many dangers, puzzles and secrets. You must fight monsters, learn to use magic and discover ancient treasures, which will help you on your quest. Use all of your wits and skill to unravel the mysteries of the ancient kingdom of Arcadia and the sea monster, Oceanhorn.

name: Ocean Protector
summary: Ocean Protector is a free online educational game that teaches students about the impacts of ocean acidification and how they can take action to prevent it.

name: Oceanic Discoveries Duo
summary:
Aquarist:
Create and observe Aqua World! Learn more about fish and their behavior and take responsibility for their lives. Control the temperature, environment, and nourishment to provide a suitable environment. Don’t forget to develop your aquarium and after a while, you will be able to open an aquarist shop!

Ship Graveyard Simulator:
Visit the largest ship graveyard in the world. A dozen kilometers of beach filled with wrecks. Hundreds of ships wrecked on the coast. Thousands of tons of steel. Choose the most valuable ship for you and start the adventure. Play as one of the workers during the most dangerous work in the world. Cut, hit, weld! Dismantle the whole ship and sell the obtained parts and upgrade your equipment.

name: Octagon
summary: One stick controls your ship's movement and firing direction, while firing bullets is relegated to the face buttons. Enemy ships you face are only vulnerable to attacks from like-colored bullets, but the more you fire, the more attention you attract

name: Ocean Cat
summary: Ocean Cat is a very fun fishing game. The main character of the game is a cute little cat wearing a diving suit,

name: Octapolis
summary: A side-scrolling action game set in the year 3897. The player is assigned the task of saving the planet of Octapolis from the evil Galactic Imperium.

name: Octov
summary: Trap by greed, the little Octov will have to use a Golem to escape.

name: Oceans Below
summary: Adjust your air flow and check your pressure gauge. Splash! The water is warm and visibility good. Slowly you descend into an exotic undersea world, the water teeming with colourful fish and spectacular reef formations. Today you've decided to explore a sunken ship. Tomorrow maybe you'll slice through the water on a Manta Ray, or dare to face a Great White Shark! Oceans Below contains over 200 video segments and over 125 photographs, covering underwater animal and plant life, plane wrecks, ship wrecks and more.

name: OceanDive
summary: OceanDive is a unique combination of a 3D screensaver and a scuba diving exploration game.

name: O Conto de Ada
summary: O Conto de Ada is a textual mobile game, based on an original science-fiction story, where your choices define your paths within the game. Through an immersive narrative and soundtrack, you take on the role of Ada, an aerospace engineer responsible for researching and terraforming planets. His companions on this mission are Iatso, a monitoring artificial intelligence, and Azazel, a grumpy diary robot. In this context you will embark on an interplanetary space exploration knowing more about yourself and the universe from the choices you make.

name: Oceans: Unlocked
summary: An Ocean exploration/simulation game made in Unity.

name: Occult Mingle
summary: Connect with four occult enthusiasts (and possibly sell your soul) in this macabre LGBTQ+ horror visual novel/interface drama dating sim.

name: Ochakai he no Shoutaijou
summary: An indie otome game about a tea party

name: Octonauts
summary: Explore! Rescue! Protect! Dive into science on action-packed missions with the Octonauts and learn about amazing sea creatures and their habitats.

name: Octagon - A Minimal Game with Maximum Challenge
OctoRaid VR
summary: OctoRaid VR is a Cross-Platform-Based Asymmetric PvP VR Party Game in which you become an Octo or Hunter character and Fight against each other. If you access a VR device, you play Octo, a Giant Octopus Monster, and if you access Only PC or Mobile, you play Hunter, a Employee with a Diver concept.

name: Ocean's Crabellum
summary: Shoot 'em up! The former soldier Crab have to holster up his old Parabellum guns. He must wreak massive havoc to clean up the Big Ocean from villains and get revenge for his friends. Destroy the unrestrained mafia gang led by giant octopus in the best tradition of top-down and scroll-action shooters.

name: OceanCraft
summary: OceanCraft is a game about surviving alone - or with your friends on a self build vehicle in the ocean.

name: Ochaken Kururin: Honwaka Puzzle de Ho~ttoshiyou?
summary: Ochaken Kururin ~ Honwaka Puzzle de Ho~ttoshiyou? is a Simulation game, published by MTO, which was released in Japan in 2004.

name: Octonauts and the Whale Shark
summary: Rescue Dashi from the belly of the Whale Shark in a risky adventure.

name: Octet
summary: A poem-composing, roguelike fever dream.

name: Ocean Drive Challenge
summary: Ocean Drive Challenge is Out Run inspired Xbox 360 live arcade indie game.

name: O Conde de Monte Cristo
summary: Based on the book of the same name, your objective is to escape from your prison cell and find a treasure chest on an island.

name: Occult Crime Police
summary: The Truth Is Pretty Out There

name: Ocarina of Time: Master Quest Redux
summary: This hack aims at improving the original experience of Ocarina of Time by adding some QoL improvements by applying the ASM patches provided by the Ocarina of Time Randomizer project by Roman971 and its contributors.

name: Octocopter: Super Sub Squid Escape
summary: Oh no! Part way through their epic battle the Octopus and Submarine have lost their way and sunk to the bottom of the ocean.

name: Octagon 2: Extreme Evolution
summary: Octagon is a minimal arcade game where you have to move fast or be left behind. As the floor moves beneath you, spin your world around to dodge speed bumps. An energizing soundtrack by award winning Jessica Kelly keeps you in the zone on your race to the finish. But with each round over after just 60 seconds, only super-fast reflexes will beat this very challenging game.

name: Oceans
summary: Adapt your Species to survive and thrive in the Oceans depths in this turn-based strategy game based on the hit board game Oceans.

name: Octo Gravity
summary: Jump and run in an octagon full of obstacles and overcome your own records!

name: October Nightmares
summary: Explore a Montréal neighborhood in the 70s, investigate a supernatural phenomenon that inflicts nightmares on its residents, and delve into the depths of the world of dreams to save their lives. October Nightmares is a point & click cosmic horror game where exploration mixes with puzzle solving.

name: Ocean Scenes
summary: Ocean Scenes from Holmade Games

name: Och Noe: Thegame
summary: OCH NOE -thegame- is a zombie survival shooter type game, but is also meant to be kinda funny. As the player you must try to stay alive for 15 minutes.

name: Occult: Satanic interrogation
summary:
Are you Innocent or Guilty? A story of sinister magic, play and makes decisions in this evil adventure, a dark game with scary story where you will have to prove your innocence, or you will be condemned guilty in hell.
Can you prove your innocence?. in this mystifying interrogation game?
Where you will find an esoteric and dystopian world where you will have to demonstrate your innocence.
Or will you perish in a dark, occult interrogation?

name: Ochakumi +
summary: Players control a secretary who slides around her workplace using an office chair. The aim is to collect food items, while avoiding being spotted by employees.

name: Ocraft
summary: oCraft is a match 3 oriental crafting saga, where you can play with fruits, vegetables and building materials.

name: Oceania: Sea Animals Kids Story, Coloring & Games
Occult Maiden
summary: An anime based Square Enix iOS and Android card based role playing game released exclusively in Japan in 2013

name: Ocean Classics Volume 1
summary:
Why not power up your retro games collection with this bundle of 8 super titles from the UK’s ‘80s monster publishing powerhouse OCEAN SOFTWARE.

This impressive and nostalgic compilation includes the following classics:

• Tunnel B1
• Last Rites
• ELF
• Sleepwalker
• Pushover
• The Great Escape
• Central Intelligence
• Where Time Stood Still

name: Octopi: Snow Globe
summary:
This is the first version of the Octopi games on the iPad, featuring better than ever game play.
With an interactive tutorial and beautiful graphics, it is the perfect introduction to this series of action games for your brain.

name: Ochaken no Bouken-jima: Honwaka Yume no Island
summary: Ochaken no Bouken-jima: Honwaka Yume no Island is a Simulation game, developed and published by MTO, which was released in Japan in 2005.

name: Ocean Desolation
summary: Ocean Desolation is a Free Simple Linear horror game. After falling out of your boat during a thunderstorm you are left stranded in the South Pacific Ocean. Swim your way to different locations and find a way to call for help. But be careful, something lurks at the bottom.

name: Ocak
summary: Ocak is a turn based 2D/3D dungeon crawler. Explore stories, upgrade your weapons and fight against the Gʟɪᴛ𝒸ʜy dungeons beneath the Epoh.

name: Octordle
summary: A daily word guessing game, where players have 13 guesses to discover 8 mystery words. Also includes a free-play mode.

name: Octave
summary: Open-world musical puzzle game where the notes you play influence the world around you.

name: Occultryx: Beast of Nocturne
summary: Occultryx: Beast of Nocturne is a story that follows the Bounty Hunter H-13 "Dysis" Hunting down a rival and elusive bounty. A werewolf master of combat who has taken over a mysterious facility on the planet Stygia. The nearby city and surrounding areas have been infected with the wolf's curse. It's Dysis' job to wade through the the creatures, hazards, and minions to track down her bounty!

name: Occult ReRaise
summary: Occult ReRaise is a survival spin-off series set in the Arcane Raise universe. Experience the world of Arcane Raise 3D with breathtaking sceneries and mind-blowing visuals. Immerse yourself in the role of a young group of resurrected hunters known as Shades...

name: Octodad
summary:
Octodad is a third person adventure game about destruction, deception, and fatherhood. The player controls Octodad, a dapper octopus masquerading as a human, as he goes about a day of his life. His existence is a constant struggle, as he must master mundane tasks with his unwieldy boneless tentacles while simultaneously keeping his cephalopodan nature a secret from his human family.

The game features a humorous plot revolving around the central character, an octopus who is undercover as an average human with a family. The plot revolves around the player, controlling Octodad, attempting to complete various household chores and tasks while maintaining his secret. The gameplay takes advantage of the setting of an octopus' acting of a human to present an idea of mundane tasks being much more out of control, with a key mechanic being the suspicion towards Octodad from various family members. Its sequel Dadliest Catch was released on January 30, 2014, and was one of the first titles to be given the Steam Greenlight.

Octodad is a freeware independent video game developed by a group of students at DePaul University, many of whom would go on to form Young Horses, Inc., the developers of its sequel Octodad: Dadliest Catch. The game was developed for the Student Showcase of the 2011 Independent Games Festival, and would go on to be one of 8 winners in the Student Showcase award of that year.

name: Ocean: The Place in Your Heart
summary:
Luna is a curious girl who loves adventure.
Join her on a journey to explore the mysterious abyss and make lots of various new friends.

name: Octopath Traveler + Octopath Traveler II Bundle
summary: Two HD-2D RPGs from SQUARE ENIX’s Team Asano, OCTOPATH TRAVELER and OCTOPATH TRAVELER II are now available as a bundle! This series features distinctive HD-2D graphics that combine pixel art with 3D.

name: Occult Raise
summary: Occult Raise is a rogue-like spin-off series set in the Arcane Raise universe. Experience the world of Arcane Raise for the first time in 3D with breathtaking sceneries and mind-blowing visuals. Immerse yourself in the role of a young group of resurrected hunters known as Shades...

name: Ochaken no Yume Bouken
summary: Ochaken no Yume Bouken is a Simulation game, developed and published by MTO, which was released in Japan in 2005.

name: Oceanspirit Danish
summary: Avenge your father's death, play with the court mouse, and watch most of Denmark die in this parody of Hamlet.

name: Ocean Avenue
summary: Dive into uncharted waters!

name: Ochige Designer Tsukutte Pon!
summary: A piece of Sega Saturn software which allows users to make their own puzzle games. It was only released in Japan.

name: Ocopoco
summary: Ocopoco is a fun and relaxing puzzle game from the creator of Triangulae, this time with circles, circles, and more circles.

name: Ocean Bound
summary: Ocean Bound is a survival game where you and the crew of your ship are stranded on an unknown island. The main goal is to build a ship to escape back to civilization, but before you can do that you must establish a colony, collect resources and try to stay alive. But once you manage to escape, the next level simply strands you in another island. There are sixty levels in total, featuring all sorts of islands, some as big as continents, and each one requires a different strategy to stay alive.

name: Octopus Island
summary: 'Octopus Island' is a leisure type game with the theme of ocean elements. The game simulates a pinball machine. The player controls the left and right baffles to hit the marbles out, so as not to let the marbles fall into the middle hole.

name: Octopus
summary: Clone of "Too Cool!" from the PC game The Little Mermaid II: Return to the Sea; the graphics from the original are retained. The player must collect coins scattered throughout a maze, in order to unfreeze and collect a trident in the center of the screen.

name: OctagonEdges
summary: An Octagon shoots octagons at red octagons.

name: OctorSpace
summary: A vertical space shooter that's about more than shooting. Uncover secrets, collect coins, pick upgrades, unlock weapons, ram through enemies in three campaigns. Then create your own levels and campaigns with the easy to use level creator.

name: Octave
summary:
Octave is a point 'n click horror-adventure game with elements of action.
Dark woods, monsters, paranormal activity, nice puzzles - all this is present in the game.

name: Ocolast
summary:
Ocolast is a parody horror game based on Outlast and the gay pornographic movie 'Ursos Grandes, Peludos e Mansos', which has since been considered 'one of the most reverberated memes on Brazilian internet' for its notorious scenes and phrases.

The objective of the game is to investigate what is going on in the 'Big, Hairy and Meek Bear Private Reserve' and stop the perpetrator of all the OCO in that place.

name: Ochimono Puzzle King
summary: A puzzle game from Pu Pu Pu Koubou.

name: Ocean Mirror
summary: A lightning fast movement shooter where the ocean surface is a portal to a mirror dimension.

name: Ochaken no Heya
summary: Ochaken no Heya is a Simulation game, published by MTO, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: Ocean of Battles
summary: Ocean of Battles is a fast-paced singleplayer, physics-based shooter. Featuring massive battles Team-Tuna VS Team-Salmon from a third-person perspective using your arsenal of different classes and weapons.

name: Octoplex
summary: A maze action game developed by M.C. Lothlorien Ltd for the 8-bit homecomputers Amstrad CPC and C64.

name: Ocean Trader
summary: Build a nautical trading empire. Based on the board game of the same name.

name: Octamari Rescue
summary: Save the loveable Octamari from their dying home world in this fast paced and fun match 3 puzzle game.

name: Occult PreRaise
summary: Occult PreRaise is the final chapter of Occult Raise series set in the Arcane Raise universe. Experience the world of Arcane Raise 3D with breathtaking sceneries and mind-blowing visuals. Take on the final journey of a young group of shades as they engage in their final battle versus the forces of evil...

name: Ocda
summary: Jump, dash, find hidden goodies, play as a potato.

name: Octagonis
summary: An arcade action game inspired by Super Hexagon

name: OctoQuest
summary: Your Infamous Harp presents OctoQuest, a mash-up of your favorite retro NES games. Play as a highly evolved octopus on an eight-fold quest to retrieve extraterrestrial mushrooms from subterranean caves. Experience a cerebral journey through the ruins of mankind set to a bass-heavy soundtrack.

name: Ocean Hell
summary: Ocean Hell is a multiplayer survival adventure game where the objective is to escape the under sea research facility your stuck in. Play with friends or play single player in this horror survival game.

name: Oceancatch
summary: A turn based strategy Game like no other fire your buoy clamp to clear the pool (note*spike ball and bomb balls you want to avoid to stay in the game.)Use left and right to reel buoy back.

name: Ocarina of Time: Spaceworld '97 Experience
summary: Ocarina of Time: Spaceworld '97 Experience is a ROM hack which is a recreation of the Spaceworld '97 demonstration version of The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time. The creators used as source material information recorded footage and pictures of the event, information found in the Gigaleak and hidden assets found on a F-Zero X overdump cartridge.

name: Occhio
summary:
Occhio is a fast-paced puzzle platformer about facing fears, inside a lucid dream.

Explore this massive world, conquer obstacles, fight epic bosses to discover the truth behind this strange dream.

name: Occurrence at JCR Outpost
summary: A scientific mission in Antarctica goes awry when something is released from beneath the ice! Who is friend? Who is foe? Only you can solve the mystery of the Occurrence at JCR Outpost!

name: Ocean Scramble: Age of Exploration
summary: Nautical simulation game with sail battleship piloted in third-person perspective.

name: Ochaken no Daibouken 2: Yume Ippai no Omocha Hako
Ocean Riders
summary: Watercraft racing game with accurate physics simulation in a fantastic setting with overpowered turbojet engines and huge waves.

name: Ocmo
summary: Ocmo is an iOS game that challenges even hardcore gamers. It's a physics-based ninja rope platformer where you swing with tentacles through the levels, using momentum to your advantage. Game's unique touch controls redefine platforming for mobile devices.

name: Occultus
summary: A thrilling quest at the heart of a powerful occult society. Dive into the heart of an unbelievable investigation set against stunning Italian backdrops. Make your way through the many hidden object scenes and solve the increasingly original puzzles. Your time is limited, so warm up those gray cells!

name: Ocean of Eyes
summary:
They're watching you.
Find them.
Look them in the eye.

A short first-person psychological horror game with retro visuals and surreal atmosphere. Players explore a mysterious environment, searching for hidden figures that observe them, creating a minimalist and unsettling experience.

name: October Night Games
summary: Will you save the world, or offer it up to the Great Old Ones? October Night Games is a digital board game where everyone is a cultist working for one of two different sides. Scour the town for cursed ingredients and make deals with inscrutable entities in preparation for a reckoning on Halloween.

name: Oceanum Mortis
summary: A brief role playing that has a similar appearance to 90s PC games. Travel with your companions to put and end to the darkness pursuing you!

name: Octave Bar Clock
summary: A bar clock for the Xbox 360. It tells the day, time, and date.

name: Ocean Runner
summary: An endless runner game from Teyon.

name: Octofoot
summary: An arcade soccer jam game

name: Occultist Girl Magatsuhi
summary: Sprite scaling shooting game, in which you play as a flying onmyouji.

name: Octorabbit
summary: Repair the ship and help save the universe!

name: Ocean Rift
summary: Ocean Rift is the world's first VR aquatic safari park. Explore a vivid underwater world full of life including dolphins, sharks, orcas, turtles, sea snakes, rays, manatees, sea lions, whales, and even dinosaurs!

name: Octavian
summary: Shoot things and find things. What an anomaly of modern science. Designed like your grandmother's kitchen, outdated and barely functional. A procedural generated looter-shooter.

name: OCRPG
summary: An Arcade Styled RPG with surprises, laughs and horrors at every turn.

name: Octopus Evolution
summary: Match mutant octopuses and have fun in this underwater adventure

name: Ochkarik
summary: Ochkarik is a single platformer game, with elements of survival. The main character is to collect all the coins, moving on moving and static platforms to move to the next level, you need to find the key. Think about every step you take. Beware of hostile characters such as wasps mushrooms, etc., do not step on the spikes.

name: Ocean Explorer
summary: Journey through the decaying world of 2048. A time for exploration and discovery. The quest begins to reclaim the lost world maps.

name: Ocean City Racing
summary: Ocean City Racing is an open world driving game powered by Unreal Engine 3. OCR features the biggest, most detailed and alive open world city , advanced driving physics and highest quality visuals ever seen in a low price indie driving game. Featuring a free roam , time-trial and a race mode on a massive environment.

name: Octate
summary: The first Doom map from Mr. Hypnos, inspired by and dedicated to the memory of John W. Anderson (aka "Dr. Sleep") and the legacy he left behind.

name: Octopuz
summary:
Octopuz will keep your mind and fingers sharp with its deceptively difficult memory puzzles.
The rules are easy. Replicate the pattern. Each puzzle piece has eight options. Tap your way through each puzzle as you race against the clock and train your brain.

name: Ocular Ink
summary: An eyeball must fend off its hometown from the evil eye-pirate Patches Deadlights in this freeware action game.

name: Occult Chambers
summary: Occult Chambers is a third-person action-horror game set in the Himalayas, where players follow protagonist Dhruv on his quest to find his missing father. Along the way, he uncovers a sinister world of occult rituals and fantastical creatures from deep Indian mythology.

name: Ocular Deprivation
summary: Ocular Deprivation is a top-down horror game where you, the player, are blind. The only way for you to find your bearing is through the use of echo-location, and observing how the sound bounces off the walls. Be careful though, for you aren't the only one using sound to their advantage

name: Octo Vinctum: Saga of the Galactic Stardom War
summary: A JRPG/Visual Novel hybrid designed like the legendary RPGs of yesteryear! Vanquish the toughest foes using the power of kind words and musical talent! Uncover the dark and supernatural secrets that lurk beneath a cheery and cutesy world! "Prove the justice of our culture!"

name: Oculux
summary: A relaxing puzzle game with a beautiful and immersive atmosphere to sharpen your mind.

name: Octo's Balloon Challenge
summary: From the asymmetrical party action game 'Goonya Monster' designed by Terada Tera , a spin-off work has emerged! Master the art of flying balloons and balancing on a seesaw to collect lots of Souls! Challenge yourself in this new sensation game where 'buoyancy' is the key!

name: Occultism Interrogation: The Ritual of Little Nightmares
summary: Can you prove your INNOCENCE? Overcomes the Devil's interrogation. A terror game where you experience the stress of making decisions. An esoteric game full of mysteries, intrigue and horror. Will you escape from the sinister and evil sect?

name: Ocha no Ma Battle
summary:
Ocha no ma Battle is a collection of a lot of mini games (use a screwdriver, imitate the fighter movements, climb trees with a monkey, dive to grab treasures, run a race, stop before a cliff, etc.) that can be played for one or two players at the same time.

The game features 16 different characters for the player to choose from, 2 games modes (vs and single mode) and a record mode in which the player can check each mini game record.

The game was released in a special box features 4 special controllers

name: Octomania
summary: Grill up all the delicious octopi to save Lonronpia from the octopus invasion.

name: Ocean Tribes
summary: Simple 4x-ish strategy game about expanding your island empire

name: O.C.D.: On Completeness & Dissonance
summary: Fill the empty slots in each pattern by rotating the board to make the loose tiles slide into position, but beware: the painful sight of a misplaced tile will bluescreen your brain.

name: Oceanside
summary: Oceanside is a three-map Doom II WAD for limit removing source ports created by Michael Jan Krizik (valkiriforce), which he has stated is one of his most personal projects. It is inspired by nostalgic memories of his hometown of Oceanside, California and features several recreations of real-life locations, including his childhood home.

name: Octopticom
summary: Octopticom is an open-ended puzzle programming game about designing and optimizing optical computing devices. Use lasers, mirrors, filters and other components to read, transform and write sequences of colored squares.

name: Occult Rewrite
summary: Face the fearsome "Withering Curse"! Dive deep into the ample bosom of thruth! Rewrite your own history on this Ero-Horror adventure! When you and your classmates find yourselves trapped on a mist shrouded island only you can save them from a grim -and often lewd- fate.

name: Octoshield VR
summary:
Ever wanted to throw a shield at your enemies with all your might? Now you can. 
 
Octoshield is an action packed arena game in which your only weapon is a shield. Throw it at your enemies to anihilate them, but don't forget to protect yourself with it, or you will get hit by lasers!

name: Oceanfall
summary: Oceanfall is an atmospheric 3D adventure that takes place on a distant planet that has collapsed due to oceanic flooding. Take control of WR-7, a young girl that is tasked with descending the watery depths, while uncovering the dark mysteries that exist both above and below the ocean surface.

name: Ochanoma Densetsu
summary: Ochanoma Densetsu is a cancelled RPG / board game hybrid that was in development for the Super Famicom (SNES) and would have been published by Information Global Service. There are basically no details about what the game was going to be like, but an advertisement announcing the game was published in an old IGS catalog.

name: Oceans We Make
summary: Oceans We Make is a 5-minute, award-winning experience designed for impact. Using stunning visuals and straightforward gameplay, this underwater experience will leave you thinking about our beautiful oceans and what we can do to save them - all in under 5 minutes.

name: Occult Case Files: Case One
summary: Occult Case Files is an homage to the point n' clicks on the NES like Uninvited, Shadowgate and Deja-Vu. This demo was made over the course of 2 months and if reception is well we'll go full steam ahead and make it into a fully fledged game (After The Third Shift of course)

name: Occult
summary: Occult is an online co-op horror game, in which players will have to confront evil cultists, horrible monsters and ancient curses

name: Octopath Traveler: Wayfarer's Edition
summary:
A role-playing game from the Bravely Default team is being developed exclusively for the Nintendo Switch. They have brought a new world to life through a mix of CG, pixel art, and "HD-2D" visuals.

The Wayfarer's Edition contains:
Octopath Traveler Game
Octopath Traveler Sound Selections CD
Double-Sided cloth World Map of Osterra
Replica of a Leaf Coin, the in-game currency
8-Page Pop-up Book with Item Compartments

name: Occult Crime Police: Medium at Large
summary: The sequel to Occult Crime Police. Boomtown, USA is visited by a spirit medium who claims to be able to solve the case which ruined Sheriff Miranda Warren's life seven years ago. Everyone in town has a reason to be upset about the upcoming seance, but could someone be upset enough... to kill? Explore the set of a ghost hunt, uncover evidence to reveal the truth, and interrogate rude and/or stupid witnesses to unravel a mystery that defies the very laws of reason!

name: Ocnus Theory
summary: Ocnus Theory is a challenging sandbox platformer that will test your creativity, reflexes, and ability to rise from a painful fall. Explore the mysteries of this open environment, shape your Ocnus to match the current challenge, and ascend to the peak! Just don't look down.

name: Octarina
summary: Octarina is a physics-based 3D puzzle platformer featuring a trapped little octopus who must find a way out and escape out of a sushi factory site. You play as an adorable little octopus, which is trapped inside an aquarium for its whole life. Not as a pet, but rather as a sushi ingredient. Escape your captivity and find a way out before it's too late! Use the sticky abilities of Octarina to jump, climb and cause mayhem in the factory. Discover your way to regain freedom!

name: Octopus Trouble
summary: Octopus Trouble - A game with a top view, you control an octopus that fights off sea enemies by shooting bubbles and collecting fish eggs, which gives him strength and the ability to live to the end.

name: Ocean Commander
summary: Ocean Commander is a 2D side-scrolling horizontal shooter with a submarine theme.

name: OctaRace
summary: OctaRace is an explosive racing game. It pays tribute to the good old multiplayer titles like MicroMachines, offering fun and intense races.

name: Ocean's Treasures
summary: Ocean's Treasures is a VR underwater treasure hunt that places the player on the bottom of the sea to explore shipwrecks and recover lost treasures. Within 12 different scenes, you will be surrounded by some spectacular environment and fishes.

name: Oceanarium World
summary: Build your ultimate aquarium and water park! Manage marine park and make it successful by building aquariums and attractions. Display beautiful, rare or monstrous fishes that your visitors demand and make them satisfied.

name: Ocean Man
summary: This is a role-playing turn-based game. In the game, you will play a captain and lead your team to explore the ocean and find the treasure! You need to sail in the ocean, explore different islands, sometimes encounter sea monsters. You will find new partners, expand your team and adventure with them.

name: Oculus Malus
summary: Sigil inspired map that replaces E3M1. It has a straight forward gameplay with one part being a small puzzle.

name: Occula
summary: Maps vary in length and complexity, with some harder fights being optional. 3 secret maps full of BS and nonsense for those who like being abused by videogames.

name: Oculant
summary: Oculant is a classic retro action adventure platformer in a dark-fantasy world. Travel through the kingdom and discover what lies within the kingdom's dark secret.

name: Ocean Oi
summary: Experimental turn-based battle gauntlet in RM2K

name: Ocean Legend
summary: Our conquest is the sea of stars

name: Oculto
summary: A mining space station doesn't respond to communications. An investigator tries to find out what happened to the crew. Void Mine is a zero-gravity narrative action adventure full of danger and mystery.

name: Occultus Command
summary: It is the year 3260, a cosmic storm named Father's Wrath threatens to end life on Earth's upper layer. The surest way to survive Father's Wrath is to escape underground to a world called Occultus. Information on the incoming storm and Occultus is encrypted, hidden and monitored.

name: Oco
summary: Oco is a minimalist puzzle-platformer - featuring procedurally-generated music, a built-in editor, online community, and over 75,000 levels.

name: Octo-push
summary: Octo-Sam is determined to circle the world! Help him on his journey by launching him through the air while occasionally latching on to gliders, planes and various other power-ups. Travel as far as you can in this addictive distance game.

name: Octagon - A Minimal Arcade Game with Maximum Challenge
summary:
You are trapped inside the Octagon, a megaplex of hallways, platforms, and gaps—and the clock is running. Can you survive the mad race through this trippy 8-sided tunnel? 

“Octagon is like Temple Run but on steroids and with much cooler music and graphics. If you're a Temple Run or Impossible Road fan, you definitely want to check out Octagon for iPhone or iPad.” - Allyson Kazmucha, iMore

“Some of the most fun I’ve had with my iPhone this year.” - 9/10 Arcade Sushi
“Fast, tough game that doesn’t give a darn about your feelings. Go for it!” - 4/5 Cult of Mac
“If you love these impossible reflex games, then you don’t want to miss out on Octagon.” - 5/5 AppAdvice

Octagon is a minimal arcade game where you have to move fast or be left behind. As the floor moves beneath you, spin your world around to dodge speed bumps. Flip upside-down to avoid holes, surf on top of the Octagon—whatever you can do to survive the mad race through this trippy 8-sided tunnel. An energizing soundtrack by Sqeepo and psychedelic color bursts keep you in the zone on your race to the finish. But with each round over after just 60 seconds, only super-fast reflexes will beat this very challenging game. 

Features:
- Classic, Endless and NEW Daily mode
- Unlimited number of randomly generated levels
- Dynamic procedural graphics with a minimalistic iOS7 look
- Original soundtrack by Sqeepo
- Universal App with iCloud syncing
- Pure challenge with no in-app purchases or cheats

Tell me if you love it or hate it at info@lukaskorba.com or follow me at @lukaskorba.

name: O-chan no Oekaki Logic 2
summary: O-Chan no Oekaki Logic 2 is a sequel to O-chan no Oekaki Logic, a Japan-exclusive puzzle game based on the popular Picross game. The game is considered to be a spin-off of Sunsoft's Hebereke series.

name: Ocean of Mermaids
summary: Get your boat ready and sail into darkness of The Great Cauldron, an isolated ocean infested with bloodthirsty beasts and not less menacing people. Don't let the red tide consume you.

name: OcculThieves
summary: OcculThieves is a local competitive game for 2 to 4 players where your opponents are invisible. Keep an eye on each other's screens, cheating is the key to victory! Compete on 21 different maps and 3 game modes. Never let them see your next move coming!

name: October Panic
summary: An arcade-style platformer with five levels and no saving/loading. A small trick-or-treat bag packed to the brim with both treats and tricks.

name: Octopie
summary: Travel across the town delivering pizza.

name: Ocelot Sunrise
summary: Ocelot Sunrise is a top-down action roguelite based in a unique sci fi universe, with a very broad metagame that can add a unique twist to the genre. Re-discover a universe lost to an alien threat in a detailed Comic-Noir art style.

name: Oculus First Contact
summary:
First Contact is an official Oculus experience built for Oculus Quest. Experience the magic of ‘presence’ in VR, exploring moments that feel as real as they are fantastically impossible. We've built a magic box full of toys and a robot guide; make a new friend, then touch, tap, bounce, hold and throw things, and play together.

Oculus Rex designed First Contact, and is the team that brought you Dreamdeck, Farlands, Prologue and the original Toybox demo. We drew from the inspiration of the 80s: A magical decade when computers and game consoles moved from science fiction to household items and everything seemed possible.

name: Octameta
summary: A 3D-styled puzzle-solving burning brain indie game, using the Pocket Cube to restore objects. A story about AI's journey to recreate the history of human science

name: Ocean Is Home: Survival Island
summary:
Try to live the life of a man who has got on a desert island ...
You'll have to look for food, build a house, collecting and crafting things necessary for life. Your only goal - to survive!

name: Ocaso
summary: Ocaso is a difficult combat focused action game with only boss fights, inspired by Furi and Titan Souls.

name: Ocean Gap
summary: Dive into a co-op underwater horror game. Find and destroy energy cubes to stop the secret organization's experiments. Don't get lost in dark and deep waters. Don't get caught but breathe!

name: Occultic;Nine
summary: Occultic;Nine is an Japanese visual novel that is based on a light novel of the same name. The game is descibed as a "Paranormal Science Novel". The story follows nine idiosyncratic individuals. Little incongruities that occur around these nine eventually lead to a larger, unimaginable event that may alter what is considered common sense in this world. Despite being by the same makers and sharing a similar naming scheme, Occultic;Nine is not a part of 5pb's Science Adventure series of adventure games.

name: OctoMaze
summary: Priceless artifacts were stolen long ago from octopus tribe by their eternal rivals – disgusting parasites. These parasites infested the entire realm since then. To stop parasites from spreading and save the tribe, artifacts have to be returned, or everything is lost.

name: O-chan no Oekaki Logic
summary: O-chan no Oekaki Logic is a Puzzle game, developed by Santaclaus and published by SunSoft, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: OceanScape
summary: In OceanScape you can create your own underwater scene simply by painting. Choose different scapes, corals and creatures to create your own little paradise, then adjust your camera for that perfect photo.

name: Ocon
summary: In the distant future, long after humans have left Earth, a sprawling underground factory remains operational, hidden beneath the surface. The only signs of life are the occasional flickers of electricity and the soft hum of a lone robot named Ocon.Ocon wakeup in the underground factory, try to escape from underground to surface.

name: Oculus Medium
summary: Medium is an immersive VR experience that lets you sculpt, model, paint, and create tangible objects in a VR environment. With Medium, you can create expressive works of art, whether you're a total beginner, aspiring creative, or professional artist. Oculus Medium uses Touch controllers to enable authentic hand gestures and movement for a natural, tactile experience. With the power of VR and Medium’s versatile toolkit, the potential for artistic creation is boundless. Learn the basics and get started with our tutorial system. Study shape and form, then iterate quickly to find creative solutions. Use 300 prefabricated stamps—and even make your own—to build complex structures in minutes. Export high-res meshes for 3D modeling and printing, or use them your favorite game engine. Teach others how to master Medium and learn new techniques with in-VR recordings. Share your creation and come build the VR art community at Medium (www.oculus.com/medium). Happy Sculpting!

name: Ocean Drive Challenge Remastered
summary: Classic retro arcade racing game in a flashy 80's look.

name: Octopo
summary: Octopo exploring the sandy shores. Collect shells scattered across the beach to earn points. Along the way, they'll encounter special items that grant temporary boosts like speed, double coins, or invincibility. But watch out! The beach isn't just a serene playground; it's also home to pesky enemies like snails with shells (slugs) and the occasional bomb dropping from above, ready to explode. With each shell collected and enemy evaded, players strive to achieve the highest score possible, making "Octopo" a thrilling adventure of skill and strategy.

name: Octopath Traveler II + Various Daylife Bundle
summary: Octopath Traveler II + Various Daylife: two great games from Square Enix’s Team Asano in one bundle!

name: Ocean Life: Aquarium Simulator
summary: Transform an abandoned aquarium park into a thriving water attraction! In "Ocean Life: Aquarium Simulator," clean, decorate, and add fish to attract visitors. Dive in for rescue missions, upgrade your park, and build a vibrant ecosystem.

name: Ocean
summary: Venture on an ocean adventure, escape the trash that humans create and survive

name: Oceaneers
summary: A raft-crafting survival management adventure set on sinkable islands. Control a group of survivors to scavenge, harvest and craft your way to an island colony! Build expedition rafts, research contraptions to keep islands afloat, and create your own floating settlement. CRAFT, FLOAT, SURVIVE!

name: Ocean Current Punk
summary: "Ocean Current Punk" is a Marine survival sim that expands the living space by building complex and massive infrastructure systems and fortifications. On your quest to find the truth, you will meet different groups, encounter unexpected events, and strive to become the ruler of the sea.

name: Octo Curse
summary: A pirate turned into octopus. Can you break the curse?

name: Ocean Punk
summary: A pixel ocean survival game. Ocean current disasters have submerged the land and devastated the planet. As survivors, you need to build survival bases and pick up things to help you handle all situations, like the changing climate and the invasion of enemies.

name: Ochakumi
summary: Play as Ooe Rumiko, bored and hungry secretary, in this arcade-style game from Japan. Ooe must navigate through eight different office levels, propelling herself in her rolling office chair, and we all now how much fun rolling about in those chairs is!

name: Octopus City Blues
summary: Assume the role of Kaf Kafkaryan, a cowardly middle-aged octopus blood junkie and tentacle trimmer, living in a city built around a giant octopus. Kaf has succumbed to bizarre nightmares about a world populated by twisted creatures. To aid the inhabitants of his dreams, he must explore the underside of the towering metropolis and learn more about the seedy lives of its citizens. Along the way he becomes entangled in a conspiracy with far-reaching implications for Octopus City.
